columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the network security group.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a network security group uniquely.

columns.name: etag
columns.description: An unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The resource type of the network security group.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The resource type of the network security group.

columns.name: resource_guid
columns.description: The resource GUID property of the network security group resource.

columns.name: default_security_rules
columns.description: A list of default security rules of network security group.

columns.name: diagnostic_settings
columns.description: A list of active diagnostic settings for the network security group.

columns.name: flow_logs
columns.description: A collection of references to flow log resources.

columns.name: network_interfaces
columns.description: A collection of references to network interfaces.

columns.name: security_rules
columns.description: A list of security rules of network security group.

columns.name: subnets
columns.description: A collection of references to subnets.
